Question
========

The following is an indication of 5 individuals as to how they are ranked in terms of authoritarian behavior and social status:______________. Authoritarian behavior: 2, 5, 3, 1, 4. Social status: 1, 3, 5, 2, 4. The value of the Spearman correlation coefficient here is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2
* 0.3
* 0.446
* 0.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2: Incorrect
* 0.3: Incorrect
* 0.446: Incorrect
* 0.5: Correct
